items.name: Component_ImageAnimation
items.content:
# ===================================================================
#
#   Script: Component_ImageAnimation
#
#   $$COPYRIGHT$$
#
# ===================================================================
class Component_ImageAnimation extends gs.Component_Animation
    ###*
    * Executes a image-based animation.
    *
    * @module gs
    * @class Component_ImageAnimation
    * @extends gs.Component_Animation
    * @memberof gs
    * @constructor
    ###
    constructor: (data) ->
        super
        
        ###*
        * The images to animate through.
        * @property images
        * @type string[]
        ###
        @images = data?.images || []
        
        ###*
        * The easing-object used for the animation.
        * @property easing
        * @type gs.Easing
        ###
        @easing = new gs.Easing(null, data?.easing)
        
    ###*
    * Serializes the image-animation into a data-bundle.
    *
    * @method toDataBundle
    ###
    toDataBundle: ->
        easing: @easing,
        images: @images
       
    ###*
    * Updates the image-animation.
    *
    * @method update
    ### 
    update: ->
        super
        if not @easing.isRunning then return
  
        @easing.updateValue()
        @object.image = @images[Math.round(@easing.value)]
        
        if not @easing.isRunning
            @callback?(@object, this)
    
    ###*
    * A simple image animation runs from left to right using the game object's
    * image-property.
    *
    * @method changeImages
    * @param {Array} images An array of image names.
    * @param {number} duration The duration in frames.
    * @param {Object} easingType The easing-type.
    * @param {function} [callback] An optional callback called if blending is finished. 
    ###         
    start: (images, duration, easingType, callback) ->
        @callback = callback
        @images = images
        @easing.type = easingType || gs.Easings.EASE_LINEAR[gs.EasingTypes.EASE_IN]
        @easing.startValue(0, images.length-1, duration)
        
gs.Component_ImageAnimation = Component_ImageAnimation
